briefTitle: Prospective Cohort Study of Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Radiotherapy
officialTitle: Prospective Cohort Study for Identifying Factors Predicting Clinical Outcomes of Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Radiotherapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: local and regional lymphnode control, free-recurrence, survival period
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* scheduled to be a radiotherapy at National cancer center
* agreed to participate in the study

Exclusion Criteria:

- disagreed to participate in the study
